articles.title: One person dead after being struck by CTrain in NE Calgary
articles.description: One person is dead after they were struck by a CTrain in northeast Calgary on Wednesday evening. articles.title: In surprise move, ABC Vancouver scraps local procurement requirement for mega-developments
articles.description: Vancouver's community benefits agreement policy "looks great on paper and it sounds great, but it doesn't actually accomplish anything additional," said ABC Vancouver Coun. Brian Montague, who proposed removing the requirement. "I'm a big believer in less government."
